subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The American Justin Gatlin nipped Asafa Powell of Jamaica at the line to win the 100 meters in a time of 9.87 seconds at the season-opening Diamond League meet in Doha, Qatar.
snippet: The American Justin Gatlin nipped Asafa Powell of Jamaica at the line to win the 100 meters in a time of 9.87 seconds at the season-opening Diamond League meet in Doha, Qatar.
